subtitleNullable: Detecting Fake and Real News using NLP and Machine Learning
descriptionNullable:
News portrays a significant role in impacting society and civic life from time immorally as it is an essential source for conveying information to citizens, and also a surveillance camera for the wrongdoings of the powerful. News impact both positively and negatively as, on one hand, the news published in newspapers enhances the decision-making capabilities of netizens while on the other hand, fake news causes severe social or political disputes as well. It also changes the outlook of individuals towards certain happenings occurring globally. Sometimes good news helps in building up the confidence of an individual leading to hope and self-efficacy but on the other hand, negative news leads to certain psychological alterations which mostly occur due to the rapid increase in the number of news regarding accidents, suicides, and other crimes severely impacting the mood stability of individuals.
The present dataset contains the records if real and fake news which have been collected from social media like Twitter.
title: Fake and Real News Data
subtitle: Detecting Fake and Real News using NLP and Machine Learning
